source.query: select cast('ApiDB' as varchar2(47)) as project_id, cast(enas.source_id as varchar2(255)) as source_id, enas.a_count, enas.c_count, enas.g_count, enas.t_count, enas.other_count, enas.length, cast('Ncbi dbEST' as varchar2(120)) as dbest_name, cast('Other Apicomplexan (no Cmp,Pbfvy,Tg)' as varchar2(40)) as organism, cast(5794 as number(10)) as ncbi_tax_id, cast('Other Apicomplexan ESTs' as varchar2(80)) as external_db_name, cast(9999 as number(5)) as library_idx from dots.ExternalNaSequence enas where enas.taxon_id = (select taxon_id from sres.TaxonName where name = 'Apicomplexa')
select gi.id,gi.gene from apidb.GeneId@AMITO gi, apidb.GeneAttributes@AMITO ga where gi.gene = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'TrichDB'

select cast('ApiDB' as varchar2(47)) as project_id, cast(enas.source_id as varchar2(50)) as source_id, enas.length, cast('Theileria parva strain Muguga' as varchar2(40)) as organism, cast(333668 as number(10)) as ncbi_tax_id, cast(enas.description as varchar2(400)) as sequence_description, cast(enas.source_id as varchar2(20)) as genbank_accession from dots.ExternalNaSequence enas where enas.taxon_id = (select taxon_id from sres.Taxon where ncbi_tax_id = 333668)

select cast('ApiDB' as varchar2(47)) as project_id, cast(enas.source_id as varchar2(50)) as source_id, enas.length, cast('Theileria annulata strain Ankara' as varchar2(40)) as organism, cast(353154 as number(10)) as ncbi_tax_id, cast(enas.description as varchar2(400)) as sequence_description, cast(enas.source_id as varchar2(20)) as genbank_accession from dots.ExternalNaSequence enas where enas.taxon_id = (select taxon_id from sres.Taxon where ncbi_tax_id = 353154)
select gi.id,gi.sequence from apidb.sequenceid@AMITO gi, apidb.sequenceattributes@AMITO ga where gi.sequence = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'TrichDB'

tuningTable.name: apidb.GeneDetail
tuningTable.sql: create table apidb.GeneDetailCrypto nologging as select * from apidb.GeneDetail@CRYPTO
create table apidb.GeneDetailGiardia nologging as select * from apidb.GeneDetail@GIARDIA
create table apidb.GeneDetailPlasmo nologging as select * from apidb.GeneDetail@PLASMO
create table apidb.GeneDetailToxo nologging as select * from apidb.GeneDetail@TOXO
create table apidb.GeneDetailTrich nologging as select * from apidb.GeneDetail@AMITO where project_id = 'TrichDB'
create table apidb.GeneDetailTriTryp nologging as select * from apidb.GeneDetail@TRITRYP

create table apidb.GeneDetail&1 nologging as ( select * from apidb.GeneDetailCrypto union all select * from apidb.GeneDetailGiardia union all select * from apidb.GeneDetailPlasmo union all select * from apidb.GeneDetailToxo union all select * from apidb.GeneDetailTrich union all select * from apidb.GeneDetailTritryp )

tuningTable.name: apidb.TranscriptSequence
tuningTable.sql: create table apidb.TranscriptSequenceToxo nologging as select * from apidb.TranscriptSequence@TOXO
create table apidb.TranscriptSequenceCrypto nologging as select * from apidb.TranscriptSequence@CRYPTO
create table apidb.TranscriptSequenceGiardia nologging as select * from apidb.TranscriptSequence@GIARDIA
create table apidb.TranscriptSequencePlasmo nologging as select * from apidb.TranscriptSequence@PLASMO
create table apidb.TranscriptSequenceTrich nologging as select * from apidb.TranscriptSequence@AMITO where project_id = 'TrichDB'
create table apidb.TranscriptSequenceTriTryp nologging as select * from apidb.TranscriptSequence@TRITRYP

create table apidb.TranscriptSequence&1 nologging as ( select * from apidb.TranscriptSequenceCrypto union all select * from apidb.TranscriptSequenceGiardia union all select * from apidb.TranscriptSequencePlasmo union all select * from apidb.TranscriptSequenceToxo union all select * from apidb.TranscriptSequenceTrich union all select * from apidb.TranscriptSequenceTritryp )
create index apidb.XScriptSeq_ix&1 on apidb.TranscriptSequence&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

create index apidb.cds_ix&1 on apidb.CodingSequence&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx
